thread.title: UPS successfully delivered a package with a drone
thread.title_full: UPS successfully delivered a package with a drone

author: Matthew Hughes
title: UPS successfully delivered a package with a drone
text:
49 shares 
When it comes to innovation in the delivery space, nobody comes even remotely close to UPS. The iconic courier company has figured out several different ways to increase the fuel efficiency of its vehicles, while simultaneously lowering delivery times. For example, did you know that UPS routes drivers using the least-possible left turns ? It sounds counterintuitive, but the move has saved 20.4 million miles, and allowed it to deliver 350,000 more packages. 
It’s for this reason why I’m not even remotely surprised UPS is getting into the drone delivery space, which promises to explode as the technology behind it becomes more accurate and affordable.
